landing.heroSubtitle: Software engineer passionate about AI, robotics, and smart navigation systems ...
landing.aboutDesc: With over 20 years of experience in electrical engineering and software development, Zoran Stepanoski excels in creating innovative solutions tailored to your needs. From database design to ERP systems and POS solutions, I leverage my extensive expertise in Delphi, C#, C++, Java, Python, Oracle and PostgreSQL to deliver exceptional results. I have worked with leading companies, serving in various roles including Technical Consultant and Team Leader. Let's collaborate to turn your vision into reality!
landing.allRightsReserved: Designed and developed by Zoran Stepanoski 2025.
